customer_reviews.title: Stunning laptop - the best Windows hardware in 2018 and 2019 by far

Pros: Jaw dropping screen, never seen anything like it, edge to edge, super high res, perfect depth and colour, amazing. Great case finish, slightly matt finish grey gunmetal, feels luxury, strong and perfect design and visible engineering. Depth, this is the slimmest niftiest windows laptop you can buy, makes the top Dell look chunky. Cons: It's quite heavy, slight looseness to touchpad and slight rattle here, it's a known issue. Had a battery problem on first machine after a few weeks but Amazon sorted it and I got the same again, any other windows laptop feels poor compared to this.

product_meta.title: Huawei Matebook X PRO 13.89-Inch Laptop - (Grey) (Intel i7-8550U Processor, 16 GB RAM, 512 GB SDD, Geforce MX150 Graphics, Windows 10 Home)
product_meta.description:
The HUAWEI Mate Book X Pro (Mate Book X Pro for short) is a 13.9-inch ultra-slim laptop that incorporates a 8th Generation Intel Core i7 8550U processor and supports high-speed Wi-Fi Internet. The Mate Book X Pro has a slim metallic body that is 14.6 mm thick, making it both stylish and easy to carry. The Mate Book X Pro has a 3K display with a 3000 x 2000 pixel LTPS touchscreen, 100% sRGB colour gamut, and maximum brightness of 450 nits. The screen-to-body ratio is 91%, and the viewing angle can reach an impressive 178 degrees. It is also equipped with a 1 MP front recessed camera. The Mate Book X Pro is a smart work assistant, supporting Office 365 Personal (30 days trial) and 4K video playback. The Mate Book X Pro adopts a USB-C charging port that enables the cable to be inserted with either side facing up. You can charge your Mate Book X Pro, transfer data, and use DisplayPort with the two USB-C ports on the left side. The Thunderbolt 3 port (compatible with USB-C) provides a faster transfer speed, and your Thunderbolt USB device is only compatible with the Thunderbolt 3 port. Display Technology: LCD. Box Contains HUAWEI MateBook X Pro MateBook USB Type-CTM Power adapter 65W.

BOX CONTAINS
HUAWEI MateBook X Pro
MateBook USB Type-CTM
Power adapter 65W
feature_bullets: World's First FullView Display: Immersive 13.9-inch 3K touchscreen with 91% screen-to-body ratio, only 0.57-inch thin and weighs only 2.93 lbs., perfect for at-home or on-the-go computing
Home Theater: 3K touchscreen with 3, 000 x 2, 000 resolution, 1500:1 contrast ratio and 260 PPI allow you to see vivid details when viewing HD content. 2nd Gen Dolby ATMOS for immersive audio

Powerful Inside: Windows 10 Home Signature Edition with no bloatware. 8th Gen Intel Core i7 8550U processor + NVIDIA GeForce MX150 - boosts performance up to 40% over its predecessor. Bluetooth: BT 4.1 (compatible with 3.0 and 2.1+EDR)
One Touch Power Button: Enabling users to power on the notebook, finish identity authentication through Windows Hello and access the desktop in less than 8 seconds
Recessed Camera: HUAWEI MateBook X Pro's camera sits discreetly on the keyboard, and pops up only when you want it to. A safeguard for your privacy.
